summary: Access data on Nextcloud including files, folders, and users.

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Choose the authentication method (Access Token or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (File, Folder, User, or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Choose the operation to perform on the selected resource.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Specify the path of the file or folder to interact with.
